summary: A struggling horror writer visiting a small town on a book tour gets caught up in a murder mystery involving a young girl. That night in a dream, he is approached by a mysterious young ghost named V.
cast: Val Kilmer|Bruce Dern|Elle Fanning|Ben Chaplin|Joanne Whalley|David Paymer|Anthony Fusco|Alden Ehrenreich|Bruce A. Miroglio|Don Novello|Lisa Bailes|Ryan Simpkins|Lucas Rice Jordan|Fiona Medaris|Katie Crom|Lucy Bunter|Dorothy Tchelistcheff|Lorraine Gaudet|Stacey Mattina|Tom Waits|Lisa Biales|Kristine Hayworth|Marisa Lenhardt|Davia Schendel
title: Twixt
